segments.text: You're from New York , aren't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you suggest I should see in New York ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , how about the Museum of Modern Art ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't like museums.They ' re boring .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you go to see the Empire State Building ?
segments.speaker: S2
